text:
Jun Tennis Academy is an outstanding place to learn and improve your tennis skills! The coaches are not only highly skilled and professional but also incredibly patient and supportive. They tailor their teaching methods to suit players of all ages and skill levels, ensuring everyone feels comfortable and motivated to progress.

The academy's focus on proper techniques and game strategies really sets it apart, and the friendly, encouraging environment makes every session enjoyable. Whether you're a beginner looking to learn the basics or an experienced player aiming to refine your game, Jun Tennis Academy is the perfect choice.

Jun is an excellent tennis coach who makes lessons fun and effective. He focuses on technique, adapt to your skill level, and help you improve quickly. Always professional and encouraging, he never fails to create a great learning environment. Highly recommend to all!

Coach Agnes is great at teaching, where she setup tennis drills and explain the movements using clear demo. It helps visual learners like me grasp fundamentals concepts better. Her sharp observation skills are a bonus in correcting my tennis strokes and form, which make her stand out from my previous tennis coach!

I also appreciate how patient and affirmative Agnes is, as it eases uncertainties in beginner tennis players and promotes a growth mindset.

I’ve been training with Jun for almost a year now, and after comparing him to several other coaches, I can confidently say he’s the best. He’s incredibly detailed, professional, and attentive to every aspect of the game. In his lessons, you truly feel like you’re improving with each session. His approach to teaching is thoughtful, and you really learn something valuable every time. Highly recommend him to anyone serious about tennis!

I started Tennis lessons with Jun Tennis Academy in March 2024 and have seen myself progressing in my skills. Coach Jun is very experienced coach and he is very skillful and patient in his coaching. He understands the struggles of a new learner and takes time to correct our form. He ensures that we learn the sports well without causing any injuries or the development of bad habits and at the time find joy in the learning.
